page.title: 10FARMING IN LOWER PENARTH.
page.content: {Mr Forse farms Lower Cosmeston farm, which lies between Penarth town and Lavernock.His{190 acres}include some land from the former Upper Cosmeston farm,all that remained after the rest was released for Urban Development.The heavy clay loam is level and sloping, and is split into 18 productive grass fields enclosed by hedges and man_made fences.Reclamation of land,previously quarried for cement production,added 10 acres to the holding.The farm is bounded by Cosmeston Country Park,some Urban Development,the eroded coastline of the Bristol Channel,and the old parish of Lavernock. Well established facilities for the sale and purchase of livestock,and of farm supplies,are available at the{market towns}of both {Newport and Cowbridge,and all other agricultural services necessary are accesibility within the locality.
